title: 22 Acres Farm House and Land For Sale
details:
• A well maintained 22 Acres (Farm House/ Land) of Coconut, Paddy and Fish Tanks with very clear deeds
• Fertilizing is done regularly for the last 5 years
• The land has a house with 2 bed rooms, kitchen, store room and a verandah/porch.
• 3 phase electricity is available
• Additional cultivation, chicken, goat farming or any other relative farming can be done easily with the
available resources
• A big shallow well is available covering all the land throughout the year
• Cultivation well available for any purpose of farming
• Three quarter of the land is surrounded by a canal which is connecting to the Daduru Oya
• The canal water can be pumped from any time of the day for watering purpose
• The land has some teak trees, jack trees and mango trees.
• Fencing is done all around the land boundaries with main gate at front entrance.
• Land is located 1.5km distance from Wellawa-Kurunagala main bus route and only 10km to Kurunagala
town
• A very prolific and breathtaking views available since the Elephant Rock (Atha Gala) is in the hindsight
• Also this land is suitable for a development of a farm house with chalets to attract tourists and local
customers
• The total cost for 22 Acres would be Rs.30 Million only (Negotiable)
• Buyer with the highest bid will be selected
• No brokers and time wasters. No commission on offer to any other third party
• Please refrain from contacting if willing to ask or charge a broker fee or commission
• Genuine buyers only
• Please contact Raj or Sukitha for more information
